title: Daily review 13 / 05 / 2024
body_text:
Written By:
- Date published:
5:30 pm, May 13th, 2024 - 4 comments
Categories: Daily review -
Tags:
Daily review is also your post.
This provides Standardistas the opportunity to review events of the day.
The usual rules of good behaviour apply (see the Policy).
Don’t forget to be kind to each other …
- Comments are now closed
-
How does Sky TV get away with this?
If you switch off all the communication preferences, then tick the last Unsubscribe from all email box, the line below that says this:
Just a reminder, we will still send you emails with helpful information about your Sky subscription and services.
I don't want ANY emails from them! As it is I still get 2-3 a week. Bloody annoying.
-
Complain to Fair Go!
Oh, wait, Fair Go has been canned.
The conmen will have a field day!
-
Fair Go will operate online
-
-
-
Poots has found his Albert Speer.
Who is Andrei Belousov, Putin's choice as defence minister?
[…]
MOSCOW, May 12 (Reuters) – Russian President Vladimir Putin has proposed a surprise new defence minister, nominating civilian Andrei Belousov, a former deputy prime minister who specialises in economics, for the job more than two years into the Ukraine war, the Kremlin said
- Comments are now closed
